pkgmetadata.longdescription: # crfsuite-rs[![Rust](https://github.com/bosondata/crfsuite-rs/workflows/Rust/badge.svg)](https://github.com/bosondata/crfsuite-rs/actions?query=workflow%3ARust)[![Python](https://github.com/bosondata/crfsuite-rs/workflows/Python/badge.svg)](https://github.com/bosondata/crfsuite-rs/actions?query=workflow%3APython)[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/bosondata/crfsuite-rs/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/bosondata/crfsuite-rs)[![Crates.io](https://img.shields.io/crates/v/crfsuite.svg)](https://crates.io/crates/crfsuite)[![docs.rs](https://docs.rs/crfsuite/badge.svg)](https://docs.rs/crfsuite/)[![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/crfsuite)](https://pypi.org/project/crfsuite)Rust binding to [crfsuite](https://github.com/chokkan/crfsuite)## InstallationAdd it to your ``Cargo.toml``:```toml[dependencies]crfsuite = "0.3"```Add ``extern crate crfsuite`` to your crate root and your're good to go!## Python packageThere is also a Python package named `crfsuite`, you can install it via `pip`:```bashpip install -U crfsuite```Usage example:```pythonfrom crfsuite import Modelif __name__ == '__main__': model = Model('path/to/crfsuite/model.crf') tagged = model.tag(["abc", "def"]) print(tagged)```## LicenseThis work is released under the MIT license. A copy of the license is provided in the [LICENSE](./LICENSE) file.
